meanings.sent1: The small toy car was underpowered and couldn't climb the hill.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight was underpowered, so it didn't shine very brightly.
meanings.sent3: The underpowered hairdryer took forever to dry my hair, making me late for work.
meanings.sent4: His underpowered computer struggled to run the latest games smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The underpowered engine of the boat made the journey slow and tedious.

meanings.definition: Not having enough power or strength
meanings.sent1: The underpowered vacuum cleaner couldn't pick up the dirt effectively.
meanings.sent2: The underpowered car struggled to accelerate on the steep hill.
meanings.sent3: The underpowered blender couldn't even crush ice properly for the smoothie.
meanings.sent4: Her underpowered voice couldn't reach the back of the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The underpowered lawnmower made cutting the grass a tiring task.
